The twenty-fifth match of the ICC CWC League 2 ODI tournament will witness a thrilling showdown between Namibia and the United States of America at the Wanderers Cricket Ground, Windhoek, on September 16th at 1:00 PM IST.
United States won the toss and opted to bowl.
Namibia has showcased a credible performance, securing four wins in eight matches to earn a commendable fourth-place spot on the points table.

The difference in win percentage and match outcome highlights Namibia’s consistent effort, setting them apart from the United States’ struggling form, as they strive to climb the competitive rankings.
Namibia lost their recent match against Scotland by 138 runs, with top performers being Gerhard Erasmus and Zane Green.
The United States of America lost their recent match against Netherlands by 27 runs, with top performers being Monank Patel and Shayan Jahangir.
Namibia is currently ranked 4 on the points table, while the United States of America is ranked 5.
The United States of America has faced challenges, winning only two of their four encounters, resulting in a fifth-place ranking.
Match 25 of ICC CWC League 2 ODI 2024 will feature Namibia (NAM) vs United States of America (USA) at Wanderers Cricket Ground on September 16, 2024.
Pitch was expected to be neutral with the help of pacers.
Weather was clean with slight clouds and no chances of rain.
